title: Ep. 395 - Live From the Cesspool
description:
Media Matters cut a 7-minute video compilation and 2,500-word article smearing this show and the rest of the Daily Wire gang. We examine the real bigots and haters. Then, actress Rosanna Arquette apologizes for being white, and I forgive her. HuffPo publishes the dumbest article on the Internet today, and finally the Mailbag! Date: 08-08-2019
